entry.title: Seitona | Arabic Rose Gold
entry.summary:
Vendor: Moddys Custom Watches
Type: Daytona
Price: 279.95

Inspired by the iconic Daytona design, and featuring the prestigious Seiko VK63 hybrid movement, we present the Seiko Mod Daytona. A 40 mm high-end quality watch combining the perfect alliance between excellence and accessibility.

Carefully hand-assembled by experts with the next features:

  • Diameter: 40mm (excluding the crown)
  • Movement: Seiko VK63 hybrid movement (combines automatic with quartz)
  • Thickness: 12mm
  • Glass: Sapphire, anti-scratch with anti-reflective treatment
  • Luminova: Yes
  • Case: 316L stainless steel
  • Crown: Screwed
  • Bezel: Ceramic
  • Wrist size: 14,5cm to 22cm (adjustable)
  • Lugs: 20mm
  • Bracelet: 316L stainless steel (with a security clasp)
  • Case back: Steel (closed back)
  • Water resistance: 3 ATM
  • Functional chronograph and subdials: Yes
